casebody.data:
No. 07-1489. Trainer Wortham & Company, Inc., et al., Petitioners v. Heide Betz. 559 U.S. 1103, 130 S. Ct. 2400,

176 L. Ed. 2d 920,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 3749. May 3, 2010.

On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of appeals for the Ninth Circuit. Petition for writ to certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit for further consideration in light of Merck & Co. v. Reynolds, 559 U.S. 633, 130 S. Ct. 1784, 176 L. Ed. 2d 582 (2010).

Same case below, 519 F.3d 863.
